p: Serum samples collected from all piglets at 4 dpi were examined for cytokines, including IFN-γ, TNF-α, IL-4, and IL-10. The concentrations of cytokines in serum were assayed by using enzyme linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) kits (Shanghai MLBIO Biology Technology Co. Ltd., Shanghai, China) and all processing was as according to manufacturer’s protocols.
